author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Computer Warehouse Group Posts 2017 Pretax Loss Of 1.5 Bln Naira
text:
April 3 (Reuters) - Computer Warehouse Group PLC:
* GROUP REVENUE FOR THE YEAR ENDED DEC. 2017 AT 8.8 BILLION NAIRA VERSUS 10.16 BILLION NAIRA A YEAR AGO‍​
* GROUP LOSS BEFORE TAX FOR THE YEAR ENDED DEC. 2017 AT 1.5 BILLION NAIRA VERSUS A PROFIT OF 142 MILLION NAIRA A YEAR AGO‍​ Source text for Eikon: goo.gl/xgrQko Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
